---
title: "Forecasted Delta T"
---

Below are Delta T forecasts for North Dakota for today and the next six days. These are derived from National Weather Service hourly forecasts and are not an official NWS forecast product.

Visit <https://www.weather.gov/> to access the local forecast for your area.

```{r}
#| include: false
require(fs)
require(purrr)
require(lubridate)
require(stringr)

imgpath_d0 <- 
imgpath_tomorrow <-
imgpaths <- map(
  0:6,
  \(x)
   dir_ls(path = , regexp = Sys.Date()+days(x)) |>
   rel_path()
  ) |> 
  set_names(str_c("d",0:6))
```
